Package chess.model.moves

Class TwoSquareAdvance

java.lang.Object
chess.model.Colored
chess.model.moves.Movable
chess.model.moves.Movement
chess.model.moves.RegularMove
chess.model.moves.TwoSquareAdvance
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.persistence.Codable
public final class TwoSquareAdvance extends RegularMove
A subcategory of the regular move that represents a Pawn's initial two-square advance.
The behavioral differences between this class and RegularMove are trivial.
A two-square advance can only be applied to Pawn's.

    int
    undo(Chessboard chessboard)
    Undoes this two-square advance on the given chessboard, decrements the move count of the target Pawn, and sets the target Pawn's en passant status to false.

  • Constructor Details

    • TwoSquareAdvance

      public TwoSquareAdvance(Pawn pawn, Position finalPosition)
      Constructs a two-square advance for a subject Pawn and a final position.
      Parameters:
      pawn - The target Pawn.
      finalPosition - The final position of the regular move.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If any of the arguments is null.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public int execute(Chessboard chessboard)
      Executes this two-square advance on the given chessboard, increments the move count of the target Pawn, and sets the target Pawn's en passant status to true.

      As a result, the target Pawn is moved to the final position of this two-square advance.

      Overrides:
      execute in class RegularMove
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard on which this two-square advance is executed.
      Returns:
      0, the number of points associated with a regular move.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If chessboard is null.

    • undo

      public int undo(Chessboard chessboard)
      Undoes this two-square advance on the given chessboard, decrements the move count of the target Pawn, and sets the target Pawn's en passant status to false.

      As a result, the target Pawn is moved back to the initial position of this two-square advance.

      Overrides:
      undo in class RegularMove
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard on which this two-square advance is undone.
      Returns:
      0 points, the number of points associated with a regular move.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If chessboard is null.
